name: Storage logging is enabled for Queue service for read, write, and delete requests
query: { storageAccountQueues( where: { storageAccount: { OR: [ { isQueueServicesDiagnosticsSettingsEnabled: false } { queueServicesDiagnosticSettings_NONE: { AND: [ { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageRead" } } { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageWrite" } } { logs_SINGLE: { enabled: true, category: "StorageDelete" } } ] } } ] } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash } }
